---
title: Verify a beneficiary
---

# Verify a beneficiary

:::warning Breaking Change
**Effective October 9, 2025:** The `beneficiaryVerification` query (Dutch IBANs only) is deprecated. Use `verifySepaBeneficiary` mutation instead for all SEPA IBANs.
:::

Verify beneficiary details before initiating credit transfers with Verification of Payee (VoP). [Verifying beneficiaries](./index.mdx#verification-of-payee) reduces the risk of errors and potential fraud.

:::tip Prerequisites
1. You're an account member with the `canInitiatePayments` [membership permission](../../../accounts/memberships/index.mdx#permissions).
1. You're authenticating with a [user access token](../../../../developers/using-api/authentication/index.mdx#tokens-user).
:::

## Guide {#guide}

1. Call the `verifySepaBeneficiary` mutation.
1. Add your `accountId` and beneficiary details (lines 4-9).
1. Save the verification `token` for use in [`initiateCreditTransfers`](./guide-initiate-ct.mdx#enhanced-with-vop).

## Mutation {#mutation}

üîé [Open the mutation in API Explorer](https://explorer.swan.io?)

```graphql {4,7-8,16,18} showLineNumbers
mutation VerifyBeneficiary {
  verifySepaBeneficiary(
    input: {
      accountId: "$YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID"
      payees: [
        {
          iban: "FR7630006000011234567890189"
          name: "Marie Dubois"
          externalReference: "invoice-2024-001"
        }
      ]
    }
  ) {
    ... on VerifySepaBeneficiarySuccessPayload {
      verifications {
        token
        result {
          ... on BeneficiaryMatch {
            __typename
          }
          ... on BeneficiaryCloseMatch {
            __typename
            nameSuggestion
          }
          ... on BeneficiaryMismatch {
            __typename
          }
          ... on BeneficiaryVerificationNotPossible {
            __typename
            reason
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Payload {#payload}

The payload provides a verification `token` and result. Use the token in [`initiateCreditTransfers`](./guide-initiate-ct.mdx#enhanced-with-vop).

```json {6,9} showLineNumbers
{
  "data": {
    "verifySepaBeneficiary": {
      "__typename": "VerifySepaBeneficiarySuccessPayload",
      "verifications": [
        {
          "token": "vt_abc123def456...",
          "result": {
            "__typename": "BeneficiaryMatch"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

## VoP results {#results}

Swan returns one of four verification results:

- ‚úÖ **Match**: Name matches exactly
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Close Match**: Slight discrepancy with suggested correction  
- ‚ùå **No Match**: Name doesn't match
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Verification Not Possible**: Technical issue prevented verification
